U

UndoPanel - Class in fotoshop.GUI
Panel for displaying past instances of the current working image and allowing the user to select an image to be restored.
UndoPanel() - Constructor for class fotoshop.GUI.UndoPanel
Instantiate the panel.
UndoPanel.UndoAction - Class in fotoshop.GUI
Listener for the undo buttons.
UndoPanel.UndoAction(int) - Constructor for class fotoshop.GUI.UndoPanel.UndoAction
initialise with the passed in index
updateCacheFocus(String) - Method in class fotoshop.GUI.GUI
Set the focus of the cache, highlighting the current cached image currently loaded, by the passed in key
updateCacheList(Map<String, BufferedImage>) - Method in class fotoshop.GUI.GUI
Repopulate the cache with buttons displaying images and labels retrieved from the passed in map
updateImageLabel(String) - Method in class fotoshop.GUI.GUI
Update the label of the center panel of the GUI
updateMainImage(BufferedImage) - Method in class fotoshop.GUI.GUI
Show the image passed in the GUI.mainImage panel.
updateUndo(List<String>) - Method in class fotoshop.GUI.GUI
Re-create the buttons in the undo panel
updateUndoFocus(int) - Method in class fotoshop.GUI.GUI
